phrases: But it is about to get rougher.
Everyone says you are amazing, Umaru-chan.
This is how I always am.
Ebina-chan's over, so you know the drill.
But it is pretty rare for Umaru to bring someone over to the house.
Ebina-chan and I were having a study session.
Ebina Nana-chan, who also lives in our apartment building, is Umaru's classmate.
Thanks for being so nice to Umaru.
All of the online order boxes are put away...
Maybe Umaru can be self-reliant with her around!
You were so kind to let me eat with you.
Nothing's better than cola after holding back for so long!
I-Is he going to yell at me?
Also, I bought some Takoyaki Snack today.
Since she cleaned the place today, I will not say anything.
This might actually motivate her to do things on her own.
Umaru, I will get the bath ready, so you can have the Tako-Suna after that...
I am the one who is mad here!
I ended up playing online games all night again.
Hardly anyone's left online now that it is morning,
so I have nothing to do until Asahi's Sunday morning anime block.
I guess I will have my morning cola.
I wonder if it is because he is been coming home looking like a zombie lately.
It is his first day off in a while, so he is totally out.
I guess Onii-chan gets tired, too.
But I am still waking him up!
Why are you up at this hour?
Now, come have a Pop's showdown with me until Sunday morning anime time, Onii-chan!
I am going back to bed.
Oh, this is his serious, too tired to even fight face.
I guess it cannot be helped, then.
She probably would not even consider why this makes me feel guilty.
Thirty minutes will be enough, right?
Teenage standards for required sleep time are scary!
Give me a break, would you?
I have not slept at all yet.
You should be on the bed.
My innocent Onii-chan will not be able to sleep while I have my outside face on.
You have no choice but to play with me, Onii-chan!
I am sure she was plotting something, but she just fell asleep.
She is been playing one-player games lately.
I will play with you today.
But first, I am going to catch some more Z's, too...
Why are you asleep too, Onii-chan?!
I missed both the morning and afternoon anime blocks!
Huge Rock-Paper-Scissors Contest The Healing Local Mascot Necolumbus Big Plushie!
A rock-paper-scissors contest for a super big-sized Necolumbus plushie.
Umaru, do not tell me the emergency is...
I am totally going to get it!
Wh-What is so urgent about this?!
I turned down a weekend shift for this!
It is important to take time off, too.
I do not even want this thing!
You could have gone by yourself.
wanted to hang out with you, Onii-chan.
Onii-chan, it is rough on you working all the time, is not it?
So if I do not resort to something like this, you will not take time off.
It is true that I have been so focused on work lately
that I have not made time for Umaru.
I guess a day off is meant for rest.
I might not look it, but I am really good at rock-paper-scissors.
We are handing out rock-paper-scissors contest tickets over here.
All right, I am going to hit the shop by the south entrance.
You handle the north entrance shop, okay?
Not only did she bring me to increase her odds of winning,
but she totally just went to another store.
I wanted to hang out with you, Onii-chan.
She tricked me for the possibility of getting two of those things!
Only those of you who beat me at rock-paper-scissors will come up on stage.
What in the world am I doing?
Okay, the rock-paper-scissors contest has reached the final round.
I made it to the finals...
This young man in the glasses
and this girl will go one-on-one!
You are really good at rock-paper-scissors.
using either rock or paper gives you a better chance of winning.
Ebina-chan might have really wanted this.
I wonder if this will make things awkward between her and Umaru...
I cannot take it when my little sister's friend wanted it.
I am sure this thing would be happier with you, too.
I lost right away, so I went to the north entrance shop.
Why did you give it to Ebina-chan?!
That was not for me at all!
In the end, she got the giant Necolumbus through a net auction...
I bought you Wyvern Quest not long ago.
Umaru, we are here to buy groceries today.
I am not buying you a game.
Then why are you giving me that expectant look?
so if I throw a tantrum in public, he will buy it for me.
Even if she throws a tantrum in public,
I need to make sure I do not buy it.
Almost time to head to the game shop...
I always shop for groceries here.
Her outside face is so sweet, as always...
Are you sure you do not mind buying me lunch?
She will not be able to beg for the game in front of Ebina-chan.
You have to learn some restraint.
Using an underhanded tactic like this...
I cannot throw a tantrum in front of Ebina-chan.
Th-This is the first time I have been to a family restaurant.
You do not eat out much?
They had some back home in Akita, too, but...
I mostly make food at home.
That is pretty admirable, considering you live on your own.
Do not you think so, Umaru?
I will put some ketchup on your omelet rice, Onii-chan.
This serving dish is a bit small, but it is cute.
Oh, that is to put your empty shells in.
Why are you ignoring me, Onii-chan?!
I really do not know anything about these things.
This is your first time, so it is to be expected.
Go on, Ebina-chan, before it gets cold.
Hurry up and buy me the game!
Hey, you sure you want to do that?
Restaurants in the city are so gosh darn good!
It was so delicious, I just...
In the end, he was forced to buy it.
We been to Tokyo lotsa times.
Yeah, but you are not been there all by yerself.
Visitin' somewhere and livin' there are not the same thing.
Yeah, but I cain't go ta school in Tokyo if'n I am here.
Will not they call ya a country bumpkin?
and I bought me some popular clothes from Eion Mall.
There is nothing to worry about.
Why are so many people looking at me?
I am only thinking that because I am nervous.
I just need to act natural.
But If I act too natural, my dialect will slip out...
B-But I should not look around so much as I walk.
My clothes are not funny or anything...
My dialect did not slip out...
Lots of people were staring at me all the way from Akita to Tokyo.
No one will look me in the eyes.
He is the first one... to look me in the eyes...
Um... I am Ebina from room 101.
If you need any help with anything, let me know.
Put together, they look like siblings.
Well, since you got yours first,
I guess yours would be Onii-chan.
So I was doing those things to Onii-san...
